4325.verse: صِرَٲطِ|(The) path|92|98|9513$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|98|2$ٱلَّذِى|the One|73|85|138$لَهُۥ|to Whom|79|91|977$مَا|(belongs) whatever|149|161|262$فِى|(is) in|58|70|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|121|351$وَمَا|and whatever|111|134|46$فِى|(is) in|58|105|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۗ|the earth.|92|139|100$أَلَآ|Unquestionably!|125|172|105$إِلَى|To|53|100|118$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|76|606$تَصِيرُ ٱلْأُمُورُ|reach all affairs.|152|152|15442$

4328.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|105|120$جَعَلْنَـٰهُ|have made it|106|123|5440$قُرْءَٲنًا|a Quran|80|97|15443$عَرَبِيًّا|(in) Arabic|89|106|9492$لَّعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|146|193$تَعْقِلُونَ|understand.|99|108|453$

4329.verse: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|127|1195$فِىٓ|(is) in|58|88|89$أُمِّ|(the) Mother|105|135|13328$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book|108|138|811$لَدَيْنَا|with Us,|74|104|9084$لَعَلِىٌّ|surely exalted,|117|132|15444$حَكِيمٌ|full of wisdom.|115|115|1828$

4330.verse: أَفَنَضْرِبُ|Then should We take away|200|214|15445$عَنكُمُ|from you|78|107|14030$ٱلذِّكْرَ|the Reminder,|111|140|9717$صَفْحًا|disregarding (you),|145|174|15446$أَن|because|75|90|655$كُنتُمْ|you|60|159|214$قَوْمًا|(are) a people|114|312|3073$مُّسْرِفِينَ|transgressing?|115|214|15447$

4331.verse: وَكَمْ|And how many|117|139|6245$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|126|1342$مِن نَّبِىٍّ|a Prophet|94|138|15448$فِى|among|63|107|89$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|the former (people),|154|176|5507$

4332.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$يَأْتِيهِم|came to them|112|128|5418$مِّن نَّبِىٍّ|any Prophet|100|116|15448$إِلَّا|but|42|58|86$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|133|94$بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ|mock at him.|164|172|8382$

4333.verse: فَأَهْلَكْنَآ|Then We destroyed|150|159|15449$أَشَدَّ|stronger|75|93|1780$مِنْهُم|than them|88|106|730$بَطْشًا|(in) power|88|106|15450$وَمَضَىٰ|and has passed|123|141|15451$مَثَلُ|(the) example|112|121|1869$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people).|184|184|5507$

4334.verse: وَلَئِن|And if|66|84|1309$سَأَلْتَهُم|you ask them,|114|149|7702$مَّنْ|`Who|57|92|76$خَلَقَ|created|71|106|299$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|150|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth?`|126|144|2280$لَيَقُولُنَّ|They will surely say,|155|178|7703$خَلَقَهُنَّ|`Has created them|146|191|15304$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|the All-Mighty,|118|163|1187$ٱلْعَلِيمُ|the All-Knower,`|130|153|342$

4324.verse: And thus We have revealed to you an inspiration of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or [what is] faith, but We have made it a light by which We guide whom We will of Our servants. And indeed, [O Muhammad], you guide to a straight path -

4325.verse: The path of Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Unquestionably, to Allah do [all] matters evolve.

4328.verse: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.

4329.verse: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom.

4330.verse: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people?

4331.verse: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,

4332.verse: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him.

4333.verse: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded.

4334.verse: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing."

4335.verse: [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided
